titleStmt.title: The attestation of the ministers of the county of Norfolk, and the City of Norwich. In vindication of the ancient truths of Jesus Christ, and prosecution of the Solemn Covenant: against the spreading errors, and prodigious blaspemies that are scattered abroad in these licentious dayes. As it was represented to the ministers of the province of London, June 9. 1648. Concurring with them in their publick testimony.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Cotes for Michael Sparke, at the sign of the Bible in Green-Arbor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible in Green-Arbor
